markdown:
| icon           = poe2 svef_icon.png
| description    = Svef can be traced back to provisioners in the Vailian Republics, where the markets for the plant in question enjoy rapidly rising demand. Most commonly chewed or inhaled, svef is infamous for the near-catatonic state in which it often places its adherents. Those who use it claim that the drug gives them a sense of urgency and meaning, lost when the effects fade. More colorful accounts claim that the drug allows one to look within themselves and witness the sight of their own soul.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Quick item
| item_type      = Drug
| item_category  = Consumable
| requirements   = 
| is_soulbound   = no
| is_unique      = no
| value          = 50
| shop_value     = 250
| keywords       = Drugs
| cast_time      = 1.6
| recovery_time  = 3.0
| noise_use      = Silent
| noise_impact   = Quiet
| duration       = 180.0
| effects        = +3 Perception;-25% Hostile effect duration;Resistance to Intellect, Perception, and Resolve afflictions
| crash_effects  = -3 Dexterity (reduced by 0.1 per point in [Alchemy](/alchemy/));-3 Resolve (reduced by 0.1 per point in [Alchemy](/alchemy/));-25% Stride (reduced by 0.5% per point in [Alchemy](/alchemy/));+2 Metaphysics
| level1_spells  = 
| level2_spells  = 
| level3_spells  = 
| level4_spells  = 
| level5_spells  =
| level6_spells  = 
| level7_spells  = 
| level8_spells  = 
| item_bonuses   = 
| enchantments   = 
| rel_quests     = 
| rel_items      = 
| rel_abilities  = 
| rel_talents    = 
| internalname   = Drug_Svef
| location       = * [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/): Sold by [Cuitztli](/cuitztli/) of [Cuitztli's Exotic Herbs](/cuitztlisExoticHerbs/).
* [The Gullet](/theGullet/), [Delver's Row](/delversRow/): Sold by [Street Merchant](/streetMerchantDelversRow/).
* [Crookspur](/crookspur/): Sold by the generic [merchant](/merchantCrookspur/) on the beach.
| guid           =8adab3be-23fc-428e-afb4-fb524a53ecde
}}

* [Svef](/svef/) is the only drug with a beneficial crash effect, a +2 to [Metaphysics](/metaphysics/).
